name: Dixie's Wild Ride
description:
Weekly Game Jam #156 Entry
Theme: Noodle

Dixie's Wild Ride is a short 3D Platformer, starring @The3rdCurly's original character, Dixie.

Premade Assets: Dixie 3D model. (Animations were created during the jam.)
Project time allocation:
- 3 days of asset creation.
- 1 day of gameplay design
- 1 day of level design
- 0.5 days of cleanup and finishing touches
- 1.5 days wasted with a bad initial concept :T

Dixie is credited to @The3rdCurly
Music is credited to Tri-Tachyon
